timeline.message: avoid fetching all versions of an artifact

timeline.bodyText: No ANY operand is present on H2 database, that is the reason why tests are fails on CI
timeline.author: dmvolod

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                                 "  WHERE artifact_id = '%s' AND key = '%s' AND value = ANY('{%s}'::text[]) " +
          
          
            
                                 "  WHERE artifact_id = '%s' AND key = '%s' AND value IN ('{%s}') " +
timeline.author: dmvolod

replies.bodyText: thanks for the suggestion. I need to modify it a bit
replies.author: dang-gyg

timeline.message: replace ANY with IN for H2 compatibility
